definition: Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴 in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗/Tiantai county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
Tiantai county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

sentences.english: Tongbai pumped storage power station is located in Xixia township of Tiantai county, Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 桐柏抽水蓄能電站位於浙江省天台縣棲霞鄉。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整個套房由帶有海水游泳池的天台環繞。

sentences.english: Joan sprained foot of all assistance, whole change, rental cottage to all the tiantai.
sentences.chinese: 瓊扭傷腳得全協助，對全改觀，出租天台小屋給全。

sentences.english: When he was but twelve years old he was already studying Tendai philosophical speculation.
sentences.chinese: 他十二歲時已經開始研習天台宗經書。

sentences.english: A beautiful girl came out on the balcony with her lover.
sentences.chinese: 一位美麗的姑娘同她的心上人走上了天台。

sentences.english: Today, the tops of many other buildings also look like parks.
sentences.chinese: 如今，也有許多其他建築的天台都宛如公園。

sentences.english: There is general several height in Tian Tai county, general high row?
sentences.chinese: 天台縣有幾所普高，普高的排名？

sentences.english: Outdoor units of the split-type air-conditioners are installed on the roofs.
sentences.chinese: 分體式冷氣機之外機設於天台。

sentences.english: But rooftop escape hatches address worst-case scenarios.
sentences.chinese: 但是，天台逃生艙口出現了最壞的情況。

sentences.english: The noise in Chu Tiantai was highest, while Plum Garden was lowest.
sentences.chinese: 景點噪聲以楚天台爲最高，梅園最低。

sentences.english: It's fun that spies like you prefer to meet at the roof.
sentences.chinese: 你們這些臥底石真有意思，老在天台見面。

sentences.english: RongSheng came to the roof in the tiger before YiFan show the power of love.
sentences.chinese: 榮生又來到天台在虎一帆面前展示愛情的力量。

sentences.english: The Buddhist Sect of Mount Tiantai is rich in ideology for education.
sentences.chinese: 天台宗中蘊含着豐富的教育思想。

sentences.english: I applied sunscreen with SPF 30 and took out my silk- padded quilt to the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我塗上防曬指數三十的潤面霜，把絲棉被拿到天台曬。

sentences.english: The peaks of Tiantai Mountain in Zhejiang are green and black. They stand like an ornamental screen.
sentences.chinese: 浙江天台山的山峯是青黛色的，猶如豎起的畫屏。

sentences.english: Tiantai Sect is the first Buddhism Sect in China.
sentences.chinese: 天台宗是我國第一個佛教宗派。

definition: top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
